843820.name: TheShooterGame
843820.description:
GamePlay: Survive as long as possible in the town filled with bad guys. Find guns and ammo in town.

Features:

• Weapons: Find them around town. Lots of weapons and ammo

• Survive: Survive as long as possible in town

• FPS: TheShootoutGame is a first person shooter

• PlayTime: Keeps track of time played in game

• HardCore: No save/load, no hp or armor ui, and no checkpoints

• KillCount: Keep track of bad guys killed

• World: Your trapped in a town. Kill as much bad guys as you can
843820.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
